front.title: RTP Payload Format for H.264 Reduced-Complexity Decoding Operation (RCDO) Video

abstract.t: This document describes an RTP payload format for the Reduced- Complexity Decoding Operation (RCDO) for H.264 Baseline profile bitstreams, as specified in ITU-T Recommendation H.241. RCDO reduces the decoding cost and resource consumption of the video processing. The RCDO RTP payload format is based on the H.264 RTP payload format. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
